cmput301W12.android.project.view.helper
Class CheckBoxArrayAdapter

java.lang.Object
  
      cmput301W12.android.project.view.helper.CheckBoxArrayAdapter

public class CheckBoxArrayAdapter
extends

Author:
romansky march 22nd This tutorial was used to help setup this Adapter http://www.vogella.de/articles/AndroidListView/article.html#overview_listview This adapter object acts as a bridge between an array of check boxes and the underlying container objects. The Adapter provides access to the data items. The Adapter is also responsible for making a View for each item in the data set.

Method Detail

getView

public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
Get a View that displays the data at the specified position in the data set. Each view (row) displays the name of the container along with the check box.
